p: The leaves of L. formosana are a source of lignan glycosides and flavonoid glycosides as well as hydrolysable tannins [ 6, 8], which is consistent with the antioxidant activity of L. formosana leaf extracts [ 9, 10]. The leaf essential oil of L. formosana from Taiwan has shown α-pinene (40.9%), β-pinene (24.8%), limonene (18.3%), α-phellandrene (8.9%), terpinen-4-ol (8.1%), and sabinene (5.6%) as the major components [ 11]. In contrast, another leaf essential oil sample from Taiwan had terpinen-4-ol (32.0%), β-pinene (18.0%), γ-terpinene (13.8%), and α-terpinene (9.7%) as the predominant compounds [ 12].
